title: 💡 Bot Cheat Sheet | Jeeves
description: Here's a quick guide to help you get started with Jeeves, our guild management bot. Follow these steps to set up your account and keep your character information organized!

fields.name: /affix
fields.value: Display the current Mythic+ affixes for the week.

fields.name: /worldboss
fields.value: Check the current World Boss and their location.

Jeeves automatically syncs all your characters, but you can manage visibility:

• `/characters view` – See your synced characters
• `/characters hide` – Hide any alts you don’t want visible
• `/characters ignore` – Remove a character entirely from tracking

🧩 You don’t need to manually “register” alts — just make sure they’re visible if you want them tracked!

fields.name: 💡 Helpful Tips
fields.value:
🔄 You can change your main anytime by re-running `/characters set-main`
👀 Use `/characters view` to see your synced characters
❓ Need help? Type `!mainhelp` or ask in <#guild-chat>

footer.text: Thanks for keeping your info up to date! Let’s keep Compulsion strong 💪 and organized 🧙‍♂️.
